subject: probability
title: Uniform Distribution
contentHtml: The uniform distribution is a fundamental concept in probability theory, describing a continuous random variable that takes on all values within a given interval with equal likelihood.
intuition: The uniform distribution is often used to model unknown values that can take on any value within a specific range, such as the temperature outside or the time of day.
realWorldApplications: Modeling random variables in machine learning and AI applications
